field.label: Reqid
field.help: This ID is used to distinguish traffic and security policies between several if_ipsec interfaces.

field.label: Local address
field.help: Local tunnel address used for the outer IP header of ESP packets

field.label: Remote address
field.help: Remote tunnel address used for the outer IP header of ESP packets

field.label: Tunnel local address
field.help: Inner tunnel local address to be used for routing purposes.

field.label: Tunnel remote address
field.help: Inner tunnel remote address to be used for routing purposes. The size of the subnet containing local and remote will be calculated automatically

field.label: Tunnel secondary local address
field.help: Inner tunnel local address to be used for routing purposes.

field.label: Tunnel secondary remote address
field.help: Inner tunnel remote address to be used for routing purposes. The size of the subnet containing local and remote will be calculated automatically
